title: Just My Luck
description: It was supposed to be the lottery win they’d always dreamed of…For fifteen years, Lexi and Jake have played the same six numbers with their friends. Over drinks, dinner parties and summer barbecues, the three couples have discussed the important stuff—kids, marriages, careers—and they’ve laughed off their disappointment when they failed to win anything.But then the unthinkable happens. There’s a rift in the group. Someone is caught in a lie. And soon after, six numbers come up that change everything forever.Lexi and Jake have a ticket worth millions. And their friends are determined to claim a share.
author: Adele Parks
